ygData.subject: RE: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: Question: Were you able to complete the quest for the hero bracer yourself as a bard? There has been some uncertainty as to whether this is possible or not.
ygData.messageBody:
Question: Were you able to complete the quest for the hero bracer yourself
as a bard? There has been some uncertainty as to whether this is possible or
not.

Answer: I would hold off and see what the final stats for the Lambent armor
is when it hits the live servers because what you see on the test server may
change slightly.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 11, 1999 6:40 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Lambent Armor stats
>
>
> From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>
> > > From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
> > >
> > > > From: Jason Osborne <jasono@...>
> > > >
> > > > Sorry, I forgot to post that. The color is a very
> > > attractive deep blue.
> > >
> > > Ohh, I'm in heaven. I recently joined a small guild, and
> > > last night the
> > > leader informed me they had acquired the components
> necessary for a
> > > breastplate. I've been dying to find a new set of armor that
> > > doesn't make
> > > me look like C-3PO with a hatchet, and it couldn't get much
> > > better than
> > > blue ('cept maybe green, but the rangers already cornered
> > > that market, I'm
> > > sure).
> > >
> > > Athren Notechaser, little blue-boy to be
> > >
>
> I have only seen stats for Lambent Bracer and Greaves, and I
> must say they
> sound pretty nice for mid-levels. Some of the Imbrued Plate
> PoF armor
> pieces do have questionable stat raises so these might be a
> nice alternative
> (come on now, +5 WIS on Imbrued gauntlets??? I'm keeping them
> though, just
> in case Verant decides to change things) =)
>
> I'd like to ask an opinion: I have a Hero bracer (AC9, +10
> STR, +something
> disease or poison), and a Serpentine Bracer (AC1, +3 DEX, +9
> AGI). Should I
> stick with the Serpentine or go with a Lambent (AC9, +1 CHA, +4 STR)?
>
> Also debating on going with Lambent Greaves (AC13, +1 CHA, +5 AGI) or
> sticking with Mithril (AC10, +7 STR, +5 vs Magic). Nice AC on
> the Lambent,
> but I like the stat and MR buff on mithril.
>
> Currently stats are: STR 131, DEX 129 (or close to it), AGI
> 144, CHA 104.
>
> Does anyone have stats on the other Lambent pieces?
>
> Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
> Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
> Veeshan
>
